trans-unit.source:
• Value get inherited to subpages
  • The description will be shown on search engine results
  • Maximal 156 characters.
  • %site% will be replaced with the websites name.
  • %title% will be replaced with the actual title of the site
  • %override% will be replaced with the value, which is entred on «Title override». If this value is not present, the title will be used instead.
